configuration.name: mc-item-022398373670876026
configuration.title: Weather Observations in Amarillo, Texas
configuration.stem: The first weather chart shows past weather in Amarillo. These weather data were recorded for the same days the predictions were made. Compare what actually happened with the weather to the original predictions in the second chart.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.label: Actual Weather
options.imageAlt: In this illustration, the actual weather over a three-day period in Amarillo, Texas is reported. It shows the high and low temperatures, a description of the weather, the amount of  precipitation, wind speed and direction, and the relative humidity that occurred during November 25, 26, and 27.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.label: Predicted Weather
options.imageAlt: In this illustration, a three-day weather forecast is shown for Amarillo, Texas. It shows the high and low temperatures, a description of the type of weather expected, the chance for precipitation, wind speed and direction, and the relative humidity predicted for November 25, 26, and 27.
